entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
